languages.text: {n}Некоторые из тех, кого я провожала на другую сторону, смотрели на меня так же. Я не понимала. Но теперь... Неужели ткач, исполняющий долг пред Неумирающим, как и блюститель, исполняющий долг перед Домин, для мирян подобен чудовищу?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Некоторые из тех, кого я провожала на другую сторону, смотрели на меня такими же глазами. Раньше я не понимала. Не задумывалась. Но теперь... Неужели ткач, исполняющий свой долг пред Неумирающим, как и блюститель, исполняющий долг перед Эним, для обычных людей подобен монстру, ломающему жизни?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Some of the people I escorted to the other side looked at me the same way. In the past, I did not understand, but now... Do the laypeople see spinners performing their duty to the Undying One or enforcers performing theirs to the Domin as monsters?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Некоторые из тех, кого я провожала на другую сторону, смотрели на меня так же. Я не понимала. Но теперь... Неужели ткач, исполняющий долг пред Неумирающим, как и блюститель, исполняющий долг перед Домин, для мирян подобен чудовищу?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Some of the people I escorted to the other side looked at me the same way. I used to not understand, but now... Do the laypeople see a weaver who performs their duty to the Undying and the enforcer who performs their duty to Enim as monsters?{/n}

{n}Some of the people I escorted to the other side looked at me the same way. I used to not understand, but now... Do the laypeople see a weaver who performs their duty to the Undying and the enforcer who performs their duty to Enim as monsters?{/n}

{n}Some of the people I escorted to the other side looked at me the same way. In the past, I did not understand, but now... Do the laypeople see weavers performing their duty to the Undying or enforcers performing theirs to Enim as monsters?{/n}

{n}Some of the people I escorted to the other side looked at me the same way. In the past, I did not understand, but now... Do the laypeople see weavers performing their duty to the Undying or enforcers performing theirs to Enim as monsters?{/n}

{n}Some of the people I escorted to the other side looked at me the same way. In the past, I did not understand, but now... Do the laypeople see spinners performing their duty to the Undying One or enforcers performing theirs to the Domin as monsters?{/n}

{n}Some of the people I escorted to the other side looked at me the same way. In the past, I did not understand, but now... Do the laypeople see spinners performing their duty to the Undying One or enforcers performing theirs to the Domin as monsters?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einige der Leute, die ich auf die andere Seite eskortiert habe, haben mich auf genau die gleiche Weise angesehen. Früher habe ich das nicht verstanden, doch jetzt ... Betrachten Laien Spinner, die ihre Pflicht dem Todlosen gegenüber erfüllen, oder Enforcer, die ihre Pflicht {rt_mf|dem|der} Domin gegenüber erfüllen, als Monster?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the people I escorted to the other side looked at me the same way. In the past, I did not understand, but now... Do the laypeople see spinners performing their duty to the Undying One or enforcers performing theirs to the Domin as monsters?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einige der Leute, die ich auf die andere Seite eskortiert habe, haben mich auf genau die gleiche Weise angesehen. Früher habe ich das nicht verstanden, doch jetzt ... Betrachten Laien Spinner, die ihre Pflicht dem Todlosen gegenüber erfüllen, oder Enforcer, die ihre Pflicht {mf|dem|der} Domin gegenüber erfüllen, als Monster?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Algunas de las personas a las que escolté al otro lado me miran de la misma forma. Antes no lo entendía, pero ahora... ¿Ven los laicos como monstruos a los tejedores que cumplen con su deber hacia el Inmortal o a los guardias que cumplen con el suyo hacia {rt_mf|el|la} Domin?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the people I escorted to the other side looked at me the same way. In the past, I did not understand, but now... Do the laypeople see spinners performing their duty to the Undying One or enforcers performing theirs to the Domin as monsters?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Algunas de las personas a las que escolté al otro lado me miran de la misma forma. Antes no lo entendía, pero ahora... ¿Ven los laicos como monstruos a los tejedores que cumplen con su deber hacia el Inmortal o a los guardias que cumplen con el suyo hacia {rt_mf|el|la} Domin?{/n}

languages.text: {n}私があちら側に連れて行ったうちの何人かは、私を同じような目で見た。昔は理解できなかったが、今は…一般市民は不死の者への使命を果たす紡績工や、ドミンへの職務を果たすエンフォーサーを、怪物として見ているのだろうか？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the people I escorted to the other side looked at me the same way. In the past, I did not understand, but now... Do the laypeople see spinners performing their duty to the Undying One or enforcers performing theirs to the Domin as monsters?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}私があちら側に連れて行ったうちの何人かは、私を同じような目で見た。昔は理解できなかったが、今は…一般市民は不死の者への使命を果たす織り手や、エニムへの職務を果たすエンフォーサーを、怪物として見ているのだろうか？{/n}

languages.text: {n}之前，一部分被我送往彼岸的人也曾用同样的目光看着我。那个时候我并不明白，可现在……那些船员是怎么看这一切的呢？是织网者在向不死之神履行职责？还是执法者仿佛怪物一样，向秘者履行他们的职责？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the people I escorted to the other side looked at me the same way. In the past, I did not understand, but now... Do the laypeople see spinners performing their duty to the Undying One or enforcers performing theirs to the Domin as monsters?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}之前，一部分被我送往彼岸的人也曾用同样的目光看着我。那个时候我并不明白，可现在……那些船员是怎么看这一切的呢？是织网者在向不死之神履行职责？还是执法者仿佛怪物一样，向秘者履行他们的职责？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Certains de ceux que j'ai accompagnés de l'autre côté me regardaient ainsi. Avant, je ne comprenais pas pourquoi, mais maintenant... Les profanes voient-ils les tisseurs qui accomplissent leur devoir envers l'Immortel ou les prévôts aux ordres {rt_mf|du|de la} Domin comme des monstres ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the people I escorted to the other side looked at me the same way. In the past, I did not understand, but now... Do the laypeople see spinners performing their duty to the Undying One or enforcers performing theirs to the Domin as monsters?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Certains de ceux que j'ai accompagnés de l'autre côté me regardaient ainsi. Avant, je ne comprenais pas pourquoi, mais maintenant... Les profanes voient-ils les tisseurs qui accomplissent leur devoir envers l'Immortel ou les prévôts aux ordres {rt_mf|du|de la} Domin comme des monstres ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Diğer tarafa eşlik ettiğim bazı insanlar da bana bu şekilde bakardı. Geçmişte bunu anlamazdım ancak şimdi... Avam tabakası, Ölmeyen'e karşı vazifelerini yerine getiren dokurları mı yoksa Domin'e karşı vazifelerini yerine getiren infazcıları mı canavar olarak görüyor?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some of the people I escorted to the other side looked at me the same way. In the past, I did not understand, but now... Do the laypeople see spinners performing their duty to the Undying One or enforcers performing theirs to the Domin as monsters?{/n}
